00062 /*
00063 #define _BIGSTRING_ALLOC                unsigned int    // was unsigned short
00064 #define _BIGSTRING_LENGTH       unsigned int    // was unsigned short
00065 #define _BIGSTRING_SIZE         int                     // was int (-1=unknown)
00066 #define _BIGSTRING_ITERATOR     int                     // was int
00067 #define _BIGSTRING_REVERSE      int                     // was short
00068 #define _BIGSTRING_ALLOCMANIP   unsigned long   // was unsigned int
00069 */
00070 
00071 typedef unsigned int            _BIGSTRING_ALLOC;               // was unsigned short
00072 typedef unsigned int            _BIGSTRING_LENGTH;              // was unsigned short
00073 typedef int                             _BIGSTRING_SIZE;                // was int (-1=unknown)
00074 typedef int                             _BIGSTRING_ITERATOR;    // was int
00075 typedef int                             _BIGSTRING_REVERSE;             // was short
00076 typedef unsigned long           _BIGSTRING_ALLOCMANIP;  // was unsigned int
00077 
00078 struct StrRep                     // internal String representations
00079 {
00080   _BIGSTRING_LENGTH             len;    // string length 
00081   _BIGSTRING_ALLOC              sz;     // allocated space
00082   char                          s[1];   // the string starts here 
00083                                  // (at least 1 char for trailing null)
00084                                  // allocated & expanded via non-public fcts
00085 #ifdef DEBUG_BIGSTRING
00086         bool debugop;                           // enables debugging of operations on this String
00087 #endif
00088 };
00089 
00090 // primitive ops on StrReps -- nearly all String fns go through these.
00091 
00092 StrRep*     Salloc(StrRep* old, const char* src, _BIGSTRING_SIZE srclen, _BIGSTRING_SIZE newlen);
00093 StrRep*     Scopy(StrRep*, const StrRep*);
00094 StrRep*     Scat(StrRep*, const char*, _BIGSTRING_SIZE, const char*, _BIGSTRING_SIZE);
00095 StrRep*     Scat(StrRep*, const char*, _BIGSTRING_SIZE,const char*,_BIGSTRING_SIZE, const char*,_BIGSTRING_SIZE);
00096 StrRep*     Sprepend(StrRep*, const char*, _BIGSTRING_SIZE);
00097 StrRep*     Sreverse(const StrRep*, StrRep*);
00098 StrRep*     Supcase(const StrRep*, StrRep*);
00099 StrRep*     Sdowncase(const StrRep*, StrRep*);
00100 StrRep*     Scapitalize(const StrRep*, StrRep*);
00101 #ifdef BIGSTRING_ISTREAM_INITIALIZATION
00102 StrRep*     Salloc_istream(StrRep* old, istream & src, _BIGSTRING_SIZE srclen, _BIGSTRING_SIZE newlen);
00103 StrRep*     Scat_istream(StrRep*, const char*, _BIGSTRING_SIZE, istream&, _BIGSTRING_SIZE);
00104 #endif

00108 class String;
00109 class SubString;

00111 class SubString
00112 {
00113   friend class      String;
00114 protected:
00115 
00116   String&           S;        // The String I'm a substring of
00117   _BIGSTRING_LENGTH    pos;      // starting position in S's rep
00118   _BIGSTRING_LENGTH    len;      // length of substring
00119 
00120   void              assign(const StrRep*, const char*, _BIGSTRING_SIZE = -1);
00121                     SubString(String& x, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p, _BIGSTRING_SIZE l);
00122                     SubString(const SubString& x);
00123 
00124 public:
00125 
00126 // Note there are no public constructors. SubStrings are always
00127 // created via String operations
00128 
00129                    ~SubString();
00130 
00131   SubString&        operator =  (const String&     y);
00132   SubString&        operator =  (const SubString&  y);
00133   SubString&        operator =  (const char* t);
00134   SubString&        operator =  (char        c);
00135 
00136 // return 1 if target appears anywhere in SubString; else 0
00137 
00138   int               contains(char        c) const;
00139   int               contains(const String&     y) const;
00140   int               contains(const SubString&  y) const;
00141   int               contains(const char* t) const;
00142   int               contains(const BigRegex&       r) const;
00143 
00144 // return 1 if target matches entire SubString
00145 
00146   int               matches(const BigRegex&  r) const;
00147 
00148 // IO 
00149 
00150   friend ostream&   operator<<(ostream& s, const SubString& x);
00151 
00152 // status
00153 
00154   _BIGSTRING_LENGTH      length() const;
00155   int               empty() const;
00156   const char*       chars() const;
00157 
00158   int               OK() const; 
00159 
00160 };

00322   int               matches(const BigRegex&      r, _BIGSTRING_SIZE pos = 0) const;
00323   // BEWARE: An empty string matches anything, since the BigRegex match() function
00324   // returns the number of characters matched and that is compared with the length
00325   // of the string to produce the boolean result for String::matches()!

00488 extern StrRep  _nilStrRep;
00489 extern String _nilString;
00490 
00491 // status reports, needed before defining other things
00492 
00493 inline _BIGSTRING_LENGTH String::length() const {  return rep->len; }
00494 inline int         String::empty() const { return rep->len == 0; }
00495 inline const char* String::chars() const { return &(rep->s[0]); }
00496 inline _BIGSTRING_ALLOC         String::allocation() const { return rep->sz; }
00497 
00498 inline _BIGSTRING_LENGTH SubString::length() const { return len; }
00499 inline int         SubString::empty() const { return len == 0; }
00500 inline const char* SubString::chars() const { return &(S.rep->s[pos]); }
00501 
00502 
00503 // constructors
00504 
00505 //#define CONSTCHAR_INITIALIZE_TEST
00506 
00507 inline String::String() 
00508   : rep(&_nilStrRep) {}
00509 inline String::String(const String& x) 
00510   : rep(Scopy(0, x.rep)) {}
00511 inline String::String(const char* t) 
00512   : rep(Salloc(0, t, -1, -1)) {
00513 #ifdef CONSTCHAR_INITIALIZE_TEST
00514         cout << "dil2al: Debug CONSTCHAR_INITIALIZE_TEST: ";
00515         for (char * tp = (char *) t; *tp!='\0'; tp++) cout << (*tp) << '[' << (int) (*tp) << ']';
00516         cout << '\n';
00517         cout << '{' << (*this) << "}\n";
00518 #endif
00519 }
00520 inline String::String(const char* t, _BIGSTRING_SIZE tlen)
00521   : rep(Salloc(0, t, tlen, tlen)) {}
00522 inline String::String(const SubString& y)
00523   : rep(Salloc(0, y.chars(), y.length(), y.length())) {}
00524 inline String::String(char c) 
00525   : rep(Salloc(0, &c, 1, 1)) {}
00526 #ifdef BIGSTRING_ISTREAM_INITIALIZATION
00527 inline String::String(istream & ist)
00528   : rep(Salloc_istream(0,ist,-1,-1)) {}
00529 #endif
00530 #ifdef BIGSTRING_LONGLONG_INITIALIZATION
00531 inline String::String(long l) { char s[12]; sprintf(s,"%ld",l); rep = Salloc(0,s,-1,-1); }
00532 #endif
00533 #ifdef BIGSTRING_DOUBLE_INITIALIZATION
00534 inline String::String(double d,const char * format) { char s[30]; sprintf(s,format,d); rep = Salloc(0,s,-1,-1); }
00535 #endif
00536 
00537 inline String::~String() { if (rep != &_nilStrRep) delete rep; }
00538 
00539 inline SubString::SubString(const SubString& x)
00540   :S(x.S), pos(x.pos), len(x.len) {}
00541 inline SubString::SubString(String& x, _BIGSTRING_SIZE first, _BIGSTRING_SIZE l)
00542   :S(x), pos(first), len(l) {}
00543 
00544 inline SubString::~SubString() {}
00545 
00546 // assignment
00547 
00548 inline String& String::operator =  (const String& y)
00549 { 
00550   rep = Scopy(rep, y.rep);
00551   return *this;
00552 }
00553 
00554 inline String& String::operator=(const char* t)
00555 {
00556   rep = Salloc(rep, t, -1, -1);
00557   return *this;
00558 }
00559 
00560 inline String& String::operator=(const SubString&  y)
00561 {
00562   rep = Salloc(rep, y.chars(), y.length(), y.length());
00563   return *this;
00564 }
00565 
00566 inline String& String::operator=(char c)
00567 {
00568   rep = Salloc(rep, &c, 1, 1);
00569   return *this;
00570 }
00571 
00572 #ifdef BIGSTRING_ISTREAM_INITIALIZATION
00573 inline String & String::operator=(istream& y) {
00574         rep = Salloc_istream(rep, y, -1, -1);
00575         return *this;
00576 }
00577 
00578 inline String & String::readnoseek(istream& y) {
00579         char buf[4097]; int bufread;
00580         do {
00581                 y.read(buf,4096);
00582                 bufread = y.gcount();
00583                 if (bufread>0) {
00584                         buf[bufread] = '\0';
00585                         (*this) += buf;
00586                 }
00587         } while (bufread==4096);
00588         return *this;
00589 }
00590 
00591 inline String & String::readtotag(istream& y, const char * t, char terminator = '\n') {
00592   String buf;
00593   while (readline(y,buf,terminator,0)>0) {
00594     if (buf.contains(t)) break;
00595     else (*this) += buf;
00596   }
00597 }
00598 #endif
00599 
00600 inline SubString& SubString::operator = (const char* ys)
00601 {
00602   assign(0, ys);
00603   return *this;
00604 }
00605 
00606 inline SubString& SubString::operator = (char ch)
00607 {
00608   assign(0, &ch, 1);
00609   return *this;
00610 }
00611 
00612 inline SubString& SubString::operator = (const String& y)
00613 {
00614   assign(y.rep, y.chars(), y.length()); // INVOLVED in lfstr.at(...) = ...
00615   return *this;
00616 }
00617 
00618 inline SubString& SubString::operator = (const SubString& y)
00619 {
00620   assign(y.S.rep, y.chars(), y.length());
00621   return *this;
00622 }

00875   cat(x, y, r);

00894 {
00895   cat(x, y, r);

00919 {
00920   r = y;
00921   r.prepend(x);
00922 }
00923

00927 }

00931   r.rep = Sreverse(x.rep, r.rep);

00947 }

00996 inline String operator + (char x, const String& y)
00997 {
00998 //cout << "<*>" ;
00999   String r;
01000   r = y;
01001 //for (char *tp = (char *) r.chars(); *tp!='\0'; tp++) cout << (*tp) << '{' << (int) (*tp) << '}';
01002 //cout << '\n';
01003   r.prepend(x);
01004 //for (char *tp = (char *) r.chars(); *tp!='\0'; tp++) cout << (*tp) << '{' << (int) (*tp) << '}';
01005   return r;
01006 }

01061 // element extraction
01062 
01063 inline char&  String::operator [] (_BIGSTRING_ITERATOR i) 
01064 { 
01065   if (((unsigned)i) >= length()) error("invalid index");
01066   return rep->s[i];
01067 }
01068 
01069 inline const char&  String::operator [] (_BIGSTRING_ITERATOR i) const
01070 { 
01071   if (((unsigned)i) >= length()) error("invalid index");
01072   return rep->s[i];
01073 }
01074 
01075 inline char  String::elem (_BIGSTRING_ITERATOR i) const
01076 { 
01077   if (((unsigned)i) >= length()) error("invalid index");
01078   return rep->s[i];
01079 }
01080 
01081 inline char  String::firstchar() const
01082 { 
01083   return elem(0);
01084 }
01085 
01086 inline char  String::lastchar() const
01087 { 
01088   return elem(length() - 1);
01089 }

01091 // searching
01092 
01093 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::index(char c, _BIGSTRING_SIZE startpos) const
01094 {
01095   return search(startpos, length(), c);
01096 }
01097 
01098 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::index(const char* t, _BIGSTRING_SIZE startpos) const
01099 {   
01100   return search(startpos, length(), t);
01101 }
01102 
01103 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::index(const String& y, _BIGSTRING_SIZE startpos) const
01104 {   
01105   return search(startpos, length(), y.chars(), y.length());
01106 }
01107 
01108 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::index(const SubString& y, _BIGSTRING_SIZE startpos) const
01109 {   
01110   return search(startpos, length(), y.chars(), y.length());
01111 }
01112 
01113 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::index(const BigRegex& r, _BIGSTRING_SIZE startpos) const
01114 {
01115   int unused;  return r.search(chars(), length(), unused, startpos);
01116 }
01117 
01118 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::index(const BigRegex& r, BigString_Search_t _st, _BIGSTRING_SIZE startpos) const
01119 {
01120   int matchlen;
01121   int matchstart = r.search(chars(), length(), matchlen, startpos);
01122   if ((matchstart<0) || (_st==SEARCH_START)) return matchstart;
01123   else return (matchstart+matchlen);
01124 }
01125 
01126 inline int String::contains(char c) const
01127 {
01128   return search(0, length(), c) >= 0;
01129 }
01130 
01131 inline int String::contains(const char* t) const
01132 {   
01133   return search(0, length(), t) >= 0;
01134 }
01135 
01136 inline int String::contains(const String& y) const
01137 {   
01138   return search(0, length(), y.chars(), y.length()) >= 0;
01139 }
01140 
01141 inline int String::contains(const SubString& y) const
01142 {   
01143   return search(0, length(), y.chars(), y.length()) >= 0;
01144 }
01145 
01146 inline int String::contains(char c, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01147 {
01148   return match(p, length(), 0, &c, 1) >= 0;
01149 }
01150 
01151 inline int String::contains(const char* t, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01152 {
01153   return match(p, length(), 0, t) >= 0;
01154 }
01155 
01156 inline int String::contains(const String& y, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01157 {
01158   return match(p, length(), 0, y.chars(), y.length()) >= 0;
01159 }
01160 
01161 inline int String::contains(const SubString& y, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01162 {
01163   return match(p, length(), 0, y.chars(), y.length()) >= 0;
01164 }
01165 
01166 inline int String::contains(const BigRegex& r) const
01167 {
01168   int unused;  return r.search(chars(), length(), unused, 0) >= 0;
01169 }
01170 
01171 inline int String::contains(const BigRegex& r, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01172 {
01173   return r.match(chars(), length(), p) >= 0;
01174 }
01175 
01176 
01177 inline int String::matches(const SubString& y, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01178 {
01179   return match(p, length(), 1, y.chars(), y.length()) >= 0;
01180 }
01181 
01182 inline int String::matches(const String& y, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01183 {
01184   return match(p, length(), 1, y.chars(), y.length()) >= 0;
01185 }
01186 
01187 inline int String::matches(const char* t, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01188 {
01189   return match(p, length(), 1, t) >= 0;
01190 }
01191 
01192 inline int String::matches(char c, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01193 {
01194   return match(p, length(), 1, &c, 1) >= 0;
01195 }
01196 
01197 inline int String::matches(const BigRegex& r, _BIGSTRING_SIZE p) const
01198 {
01199   _BIGSTRING_SIZE l = (p < 0)? -p : length() - p;
01200   return r.match(chars(), length(), p) == l;
01201 }
01202 
01203 
01204 inline int SubString::contains(const char* t) const
01205 {   
01206   return S.search(pos, pos+len, t) >= 0;
01207 }
01208 
01209 inline int SubString::contains(const String& y) const
01210 {   
01211   return S.search(pos, pos+len, y.chars(), y.length()) >= 0;
01212 }
01213 
01214 inline int SubString::contains(const SubString&  y) const
01215 {   
01216   return S.search(pos, pos+len, y.chars(), y.length()) >= 0;
01217 }
01218 
01219 inline int SubString::contains(char c) const
01220 {
01221   return S.search(pos, pos+len, c) >= 0;
01222 }
01223 
01224 inline int SubString::contains(const BigRegex& r) const
01225 {
01226   int unused;  return r.search(chars(), len, unused, 0) >= 0;
01227 }
01228 
01229 inline int SubString::matches(const BigRegex& r) const
01230 {
01231   return r.match(chars(), len, 0) == len;
01232 }
01233 
01234 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::gsub(const String& pat, const String& r)
01235 {
01236   return _gsub(pat.chars(), pat.length(), r.chars(), r.length());
01237 }
01238 
01239 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::gsub(const SubString&  pat, const String& r)
01240 {
01241   return _gsub(pat.chars(), pat.length(), r.chars(), r.length());
01242 }
01243 
01244 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::gsub(const BigRegex& pat, const String& r, char substrs = '\0')
01245 {
01246   return _gsub(pat, r.chars(), r.length(), substrs);
01247 }
01248 
01249 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::gsub(const char* pat, const String& r)
01250 {
01251   return _gsub(pat, -1, r.chars(), r.length());
01252 }
01253 
01254 inline _BIGSTRING_SIZE String::gsub(const char* pat, const char* r)
01255 {
01256   return _gsub(pat, -1, r, -1);
01257 }

01262 {
01263    s << x.chars(); return s;
01264 }

01448 
01449 // a helper needed by at, before, etc.
01450 
01451 inline SubString String::_substr(_BIGSTRING_SIZE first, _BIGSTRING_SIZE l)
01452 {
01453   if (first < 0 || (unsigned)(first + l) > length() )
01454     return SubString(_nilString, 0, 0) ;
01455   else 
01456     return SubString(*this, first, l);
01457 }
